#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int x,t,n,i,a,j;
cin>>t;
vector <int> ar;
while(t--)
{
cin>>n;
if(!ar.empty())
ar.clear();
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{
    cin>>x;
ar.push_back(x);
}
for(j=0;j<n;j++)
{
for(i=j+1;i<n;i++)
{
if(ar[i]>=ar[j])
{
    a=ar[j];
ar[j]=ar[i];
ar[i]=a;
}}
}
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{
    if(i>n-i-1){
        cout<<endl;break;}
cout<<ar[i]<<" ";
if(ar[i]==ar[n-i-1])
{cout<<endl;break;}
cout<<ar[(n-i-1)]<<" ";

}
}
return 0;
}
